apps.title: UbiSim
apps.description:
UbiSim is a VR nursing simulation platform that provides immersive clinical training experiences. Practice essential nursing skills in a safe, virtual environment with realistic patient scenarios, medical equipment, and clinical procedures.

Key Features:
• Immersive VR nursing simulations
• Realistic patient interactions
• Medical equipment training
• Clinical procedure practice
• Safe learning environment
• Professional development tools
• Comprehensive skill assessment

Perfect for nursing education, professional development, and clinical skills training. Experience hands-on learning without real-world consequences.
apps.shortDescription: Immersive VR nursing simulation platform for clinical training and skill development
